name: KinetixFi
description: Kinetix is building a native DeFi Hub for the Kava community. The Kinetix DeFi Hub encompasses a suite of DeFi legos in the Web3 landscape to provide Kava with a one-stop platform for all things DeFi. Kinetixâ€™s cohesive network of DeFi protocols includes a perpetual exchange (PEX), a decentralized exchange (DEX), and a market for derivative instruments. Users on Kinetix are able to take on 50x leverage with perpetual contracts, execute swaps in spot markets, perform cross-chain swaps, provide liquidity, stake as well as farm, and more.
